# Set Up

Generate a list of symbiont and host responses.  Holobiont = all responses
```{r}
symbiont_responses<-c("cells.mgAFDW", "Sym_AFDW.mg.cm2", "Total_Chl", "Total_Chl_cell", "Am", "AQY", "Ratio_AFDW.mg.cm2")

```
